TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormRegionType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定表单区域在 Microsoft Office Outlook 中的显示方式。

span.span: Specifies the way the form region appears in Microsoft Office Outlook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定想要显示哪种类型的窗体区域，设置属性接口为这些枚举值之一。To specify what type of form region you want to appear, set the property of the interface to one of these enumeration values. > [!NOTE] > Outlook 窗体区域清单检索从 Outlook 外接程序之前，你仅可以设置此属性。You can only set this property before Outlook retrieves the form region manifest from the Outlook add-in. 如果通过将控件拖动到可视化设计器来设计窗体区域在 Visual Studio 中的，你可以指定这些枚举值之一**属性**窗口。If you design the form region in Visual Studio by dragging controls onto the visual designer, you can specify one of these enumeration values in the **Properties** window. 如果你导入在 Outlook 中设计的窗体区域，你可以更改中的窗体区域属性`InitializeManifest`窗体区域工厂类的方法。If you import a form region that was designed in Outlook, you can change form region properties in the `InitializeManifest` method of the form region factory class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建 Outlook 窗体区域](/visualstudio/vsto/creating-outlook-form-regions.md)。For more information, see [Creating Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/creating-outlook-form-regions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionType Adjoining = int32(0)

summary.span: 将窗体区域附加到 Outlook 窗体的默认页的底部。

span.span: Appends the form region to the bottom of an Outlook form's default page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionType ReplaceAll = int32(2)

summary.span: 使用窗体区域替换整个 Outlook 窗体。

span.span: Replaces the whole Outlook form with the form region.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionType Replacement = int32(1)

summary.span: 将窗体区域作为替换 Outlook 窗体默认页的新页添加。

span.span: Adds the form region as a new page that replaces the default page of an Outlook form.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionType Separate = int32(3)

summary.span: 将窗体区域作为新页添加到 Outlook 窗体中。

span.span: Adds the form region as a new page in an Outlook form.
